trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of application-specific <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> instances used in combination with <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa una colección de instancias de <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> específicas de la aplicación que se utilizan junto con <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> defines a reference collections of package that are open and active in the application.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> define una colección de referencia del paquete que está abiertas y activas en la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> are accessed is by their key URI value.
trans-unit.target: Paquetes agregados a la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> se tiene acceso en su valor URI clave.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> supports three common uses:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> admite tres usos comunes:

trans-unit.source: Accessing <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> data through <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Obtener acceso a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> datos a través de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.

trans-unit.source: The application obtaining an instance of a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> given the package's URI.
trans-unit.target: La aplicación que obtiene una instancia de un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> proporciona el URI del paquete.

trans-unit.source: Accessing packages that are created and stored in a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.
trans-unit.target: Acceso a los paquetes que se crean y almacenan en un <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.

trans-unit.source: To improve performance and minimize the overhead of repeated file open/close operations, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> is used to manage instances of packages accessed by <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> and directly by the application.
trans-unit.target: Para mejorar el rendimiento y minimizar la sobrecarga de operaciones de apertura y cierre de archivo repetidas, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> se utiliza para administrar las instancias de paquetes que se tiene acceso con <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> y directamente por la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: When accessing data in a package, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> address of a requested <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> is first checked to see if the package is already defined and open in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.
trans-unit.target: Al obtener acceso a datos en un paquete, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> dirección de un solicitado <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> primero se comprueban para ver si el paquete ya está definido y abierto en el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.

trans-unit.source: If the package is defined as open in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>, requested parts can be accessed directly without repeatedly opening and closing the package for each request.
trans-unit.target: Si el paquete se ha definido como abierta en el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>, solicitado partes son accesibles directamente sin repetidamente de apertura y cierre el paquete para cada solicitud.

trans-unit.source: If your application opens a package with <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> can be called to add the package to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.
trans-unit.target: Si la aplicación abre un paquete con <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> se puede llamar para agregar el paquete a la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> should later be called to remove the package from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> prior to calling <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> posteriormente debe llamarse para quitar el paquete desde el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> antes de llamar a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: XPS packages opened with an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically added and removed from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> when the document is created and disposed.
trans-unit.target: Los paquetes XPS abierto con un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor automáticamente se agregan y quitan desde la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> cuando se crea y se elimina el documento.

trans-unit.source: (You do not need to call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> separately for XPS packages opened with <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructors.)
trans-unit.target: (No es necesario llamar a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> por separado de los paquetes XPS abiertos con <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructores.)

trans-unit.source: The file I/O permissions of a package accessed through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> remains the same as the I/O permissions set on the package when it is opened.
trans-unit.target: Los permisos de E/S de archivos de un paquete que se tiene acceso a través de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> es el mismo que los permisos de E/S establecidos en el paquete cuando se abre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> only provides references to the packages that have been added the store.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> sólo proporciona referencias a los paquetes que se han agregado a la tienda.

trans-unit.source: It is up to the application to correctly open, update, and close each package.
trans-unit.target: Depende de la aplicación para abrir, actualizar y cerrar cada paquete correctamente.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> can be accessed in multithreaded environments when they are used in combination with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] parser such as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Paquetes agregados a la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> son accesibles en entornos multiproceso cuando se utilizan en combinación con un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] analizador como <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When operating in a multithreaded environment, the application must lock the package before access.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se trabaja en un entorno multiproceso, la aplicación debe bloquear el paquete antes de acceso.

trans-unit.source: The key [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <c>package</c> to compare in a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] clave del parámetro <c>package</c> que se va a comparar en <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The package to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: Paquete que se va a agregar al almacén.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> al almacén.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` defines the package's key URI that is compared when you call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri` define la clave del paquete URI que se compara cuando se llama a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` matches the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package defined in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> is used to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Si el `packageUri` coincide con la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> para un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> en un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> llamar a, el paquete definido en el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> se utiliza para tener acceso al elemento solicitado.

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` does not match the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package with the specified URI is opened to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Si el `packageUri` no coincide con el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> para un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> en un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> llamada, el paquete con el URI especificado se abre para tener acceso al elemento solicitado.

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Nota de seguridad** este método solicita <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> para todos los personalizado <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (no -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo, se muestra cómo utilizar el método <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="package" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="package" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> es un valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de paquete no válido.

trans-unit.source: A package with the specified <paramref name="packageUri" /> is already in the store.
trans-unit.target: Ya existe en el almacén un paquete con el valor <paramref name="packageUri" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to return.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del paquete que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve del almacén el objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> con el valor de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] especificado.

trans-unit.source: The package with a specified <paramref name="packageUri" />; or <see langword="null" />, if a package with the specified <paramref name="packageUri" /> is not in the store.
trans-unit.target: El paquete con el valor <paramref name="packageUri" /> especificado o <see langword="null" /> si no hay en el almacén ningún paquete con el valor <paramref name="packageUri" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri` coincide con el URI especificado en el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> llamada al método.

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Nota de seguridad** este método solicita <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> para todos los personalizado <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (no -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.GetPackage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo, se muestra cómo utilizar el método <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.GetPackage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> es un valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de paquete no válido.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to remove.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del paquete que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Quita del almacén el objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> con un valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] especificado.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri` coincide con el URI especificado en el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> llamada al método.

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Nota de seguridad** este método solicita <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> para todos los personalizado <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (no -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo, se muestra cómo utilizar el método <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="packageUri" /> is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packageUri" /> es un valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de paquete no válido.
